Introduction

SVT VOCAL Team (Korean: SVT 보컬팀; Japanese: SVTボーカルチーム) is a sub-unit of the boy group SEVENTEEN, the members consits of Jeonghan, Joshua, Woozi, DK, And Seungkwan.
